title: Why spring, summer is a delicious time in Whatcom County
content: Jun 02, 2018  Whatcom County's maritime weather is well-suited to growing many varieties of berries, and continues to be the top red raspberry-producing county in the United States. Strawberries and blueberries also grow locally and are available at u-pick farms.   Jim Donaldson
